com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.status

Class WZStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.status.WZStatus

  • public class WZStatus
extends Object
    The WZStatus is a thread-safe class for working with SDK component state and error properties.

    Many of the SDK components include a getStatus() and the methods of the WZStatusCallback interface are passed a WZStatus argument indicating the current status of a live streaming broadcast.

      • setAndWaitForState

        public int setAndWaitForState(int state,
                              int desiredState)
        Updates the value of the state property and waits for the state to transition to another value.

        An example use of this method is to update the value of the state property which causes an asynchronous task to complete and update the value of the state property itself.

        Parameters:
        state - The value for state property
        desiredState - The state property value to wait for
        Returns:
        The value of the state property after waiting has terminated
        See Also:
        waitForState(int)

      • waitForState

        public int waitForState(int desiredState)
        Wait until the value of the state property is equal to the specified value or WZState.IDLE

        An example use of this method is to wait on an asynchronous task to complete and update the value of the state property.

        Parameters:
        desiredState - The state property value to wait for
        Returns:
        The value of the state property after waiting has terminated
        See Also:
        waitForState(int)

      • isIdle

        Returns true if the current state is IDLE
        Returns:
